com.conquestrpg.game

Class NPC

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.conquestrpg.game.NPC
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Monster

    public class NPC
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used as the NPC main class that mainly loads the object from the tilemap to the corresponding location along with the image for the NPC.
    Version:
    Dec-4-2018
    Author:
    James Lund, Zachary Thomas, Matthew Doan, Aaron Brinkerhoff

      Holds iterations of i

      Holds the amount of movement for the player

      Holds the location of the npc X
      protected float npcY
      Holds the location of the npc Y
      private com.badlogic.gdx.math.Rectangle playerBox
      Player box used for collisions, door handling and monsters
      private com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite sprite
      Sprite to render to screen
      private com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture texture
      Texture to hold image file

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NPC(com.badlogic.gdx.maps.MapObject npcObject, java.lang.String image)
      The constructor for the NPC object tha makes the NPC from the coordinates of the MapObject and loads the image from a file in the assets folder.
